x-codeSamples.label: cURL
javascript Axios

parameters.name: device-name
parameters.description: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in Device.deviceName or Device.type.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Instance id from manufacturer, owner, and others

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: A location, where the resource is found

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization responsible for the device

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: Patient information, if the resource is affixed to a person

parameters.name: udi-carrier
parameters.description: UDI Barcode (RFID or other technology) string in HRF format.

Success-Response-XML.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Bundle xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
    <type value="searchset"/>
    <total value="1"/>
    <link>
        <relation value="self"/>
        <url value="http://burni.example.com/fhir/Device?_offset=0&_count=100"/>
    </link>
    <entry>
        <fullUrl value="http://burni.example.com/fhir/Device/cecedf57-60df-46c2-99ba-81165311a0f0"/>
        <resource>
            <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Device xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir"><id value="222e8105-f9a7-4e1b-b1fa-3319eed87294"/><meta><versionId value="1"/><lastUpdated value="2022-02-17T17:34:52.737+08:00"/><tag><system value="http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason"/><code value="HTEST"/><display value="test health data"/></tag></meta><identifier><system value="http://goodcare.org/devices/id"/><value value="345675"/></identifier></Device>
        </resource>
    </entry>
</Bundle>
